column7: Project design at various scales utilizing problems of a wide range of complexity and subject matter; rural, community, and urban problems, housing, recreation, and natural areas; and emphasizes problem analysis and generation of innovative design alternatives. The student selects from several sections depending on specific interests. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 5 undergraduate hours. 5 graduate hours. May be repeated if topics vary. Prerequisite: LA 336 or consent of instructor.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 5 undergraduate hours. 5 graduate hours. May be repeated if topics vary. Prerequisite: LA 336 or consent of instructor.
